description.name: ethoptimism
description.tagline: Ethereum optimism Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto optimism-eth Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Ethereum optimism directly on your website
Unique optimism/eth receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your optimism/eth wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
